snippet: Kansas City Royals reliever Kelvin Herrera has a flexor strain in his right forearm, making him unavailable for Game 2 of the AL Division Series against the Los Angeles Angels....

headline.print_headline: Royals Reliever Herrera Has Forearm Flexor Strain
headline.main: Royals Reliever Herrera Has Forearm Flexor Strain

lead_paragraph: Kansas City Royals reliever Kelvin Herrera has a flexor strain in his right forearm, making him unavailable for Game 2 of the AL Division Series against the Los Angeles Angels.
